project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement Functionality to Fetch Weather Data from API
Parse and Extract Relevant Information (Temperature, Humidity, Weather Conditions)
Implement User Input for City Name
Display Weather Information in the Terminal
Write tests for the above functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
